name: Abstract
description: Specifies that the class cannot have instances; for datatypes, specifies that the class cannot be used as an attribute type.

name: ClassType
description: Specifies how this class is to be used.

name: ClientDataType
description: In the case of a datatype class, specifies the type used when exposed via ActiveX or Java. Datatype classes must specify a client datatype.

name: ClientName
description: This gives an alternate name for the class if it projected, for example, to Java.

name: CompileAfter
description: Indicates that the class compiler should compile this class after the specified classes.

name: ConstraintClass
description: Additional constraint member super classes to inherit.

name: DdlAllowed
description: In the case of a persistent class, indicates whether or not DDL statements can be used to alter or delete the class definition.

name: DependsOn
description: List of classes that this class depends on being runable in order for this class to compile.

name: Deprecated
description: True if this class is deprecated.

name: EmbeddedClass
description: If specified in a member type class is the name of the class which forms the embedded superclass

name: Final
description: Specifies that the class cannot have subclasses.

name: GeneratedBy
description: If this class is generated by some other component then this is the name of the item that generated this class

name: Hidden
description: Specifies that this class is not typically listed when viewing the contents of the class dictionary.

name: IndexClass
description: Additional index member super classes to inherit.

name: Inheritance
description: Define the inheritance order when using multiple inheritance, if a member exists in multiple superclasses which one will take precedence.

name: Language
description: The default language used to implement methods for this class.

name: LegacyInstanceContext
description: If true then pass %this as first argument of all instance methods

name: MemberSuper
description: This is the class to inherit if this class is used as a member class in member inheritance

name: NoContext
description: If true, datatype methods have access to the current instance instead of providing their own context.

name: NoExtent
description: If TRUE will prevent this class from instantiating a persistent extent.

name: OdbcType
description: In the case of a datatype class, specifies the type used when exposed via ODBC or JDBC. Datatype classes must specify an ODBC type.

name: Owner
description: Specifies the owner of the class and its corresponding table. By default, classes and tables are owned by _SYSTEM.

name: Partitioned
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies whether the table is partitioned.

name: ProcedureBlock
description: Specifies that the class uses procedure block for method code.

name: ProjectionClass
description: Additional projection member super classes to inherit.

name: PropertyClass
description: Additional property member super classes to inherit.

name: QueryClass
description: Additional query member super classes to inherit.

name: ServerOnly
description: Specifies whether this class is projected to Java clients.

name: Sharded
description: 0 if table is not sharded, 1 if it is sharded on the shard manager, 2 if it is sharded on the shard itself.

name: SoapBindingStyle
description: Specifies the SOAP Binding used by this class when it is used to send and receive mnessages via SOAP.

name: SoapBodyUse
description: Specifies the encoding used for SOAP messages.

name: SqlCategory
description: In the case of a datatype class, specifies a type to use for calculations in SQL. Datatype classes must specify an SQL Category.

name: SqlRowIdName
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies an altername field name used for the ID column. By default the ID is called ID.

name: SqlRowIdPrivate
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies whether the ID column is projected to ODBC as a hidden field.

name: SqlTableName
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies the table name used to identify the class in its SQL projection. By default, the SQL table name is the same as the class name.

name: StorageStrategy
description: Specifies the name of the storage strategy used to control persistence for this class.

name: System
description: Specifies the order to compile classes in when compiling a set, we always proceed in the order 1,2,3,4,0 where 0 is the default if not specified.

name: TriggerClass
description: Additional trigger member super classes to inherit.

name: ViewQuery
description: Gives the SQL query used for View definition of this class.
